channel.title: Latest gambling articles on gambling tips, recommendations

item.title: Can you beat the Gambling Odds?
item.description: A lottery is renowned as offering worse odds than other gambling games. But other games too in a formal gambling scenario (such as a casino) weigh the odds in favor of the people who are running the games. Casinos have something called the vig (short for vigorish) which is the built-in house advantage on most bets on any game in a casino.
item.itunes:author: www.gamblux.com
